title: What's the worst job you ever had
body:
If you are of age to have had multiple jobs in your life, post which job you hated the most

For me it was working a call center with sprint. So miserable. They would listen to your calls and you'd have to get training every week on a call you took, as well as making sure that your stats (time spent, did you solve the issue, time on hold, etc) were good. Between that and the abuse you get from angry people yelling at you over the phone because they don't know how to read their bill or fine print, as well as managers and supervisors that don't give a shit about you; I couldn't take it. There are people who can handle that type of environment and thrive in it, but I can't. Plus, we were pressured to sell additional phone lines. I'm not a salesman.
